text: Research Reviews Membership Pricing FAQs About Why TISLP Team Process Contact Us Log in Join First, select a gift membership: All gift memberships are for one year only, unlike our standard memberships that auto-renew. Then: After you pay for a gift membership you'll be redirected to a page to enter the name and email of who you want to send this gift membership to, plus a send date. Your friend will receive their membership by email on that date! Note: If you're wanting to buy  several gifts, it may make more sense to do a group membership instead. Contact us and we'll help you figure out options. Questions? Contact us. Or visit our FAQ page for answers to common questions. Why TISLP FAQs Team Process Contact Us The Informed SLP LLC © 2023 Privacy and Terms & Conditions of Service Policies. Why do you need my billing address? Our records indicate your billing address is not on file, and we need this for tax purposes. We will not use your address for anything other than tax record keeping. Please email communications@theinformedslp.com if you have any questions.
